key.name: preload-engine-mode
key.description: Preload engines are loaded with this mode. 0 = user customized engines. 1 = language related engines.

key.name: preload-engines-inited
key.description: The key preload_engines is initialized

key.name: preload-engines
key.description: Preload engines during ibus starts up

key.name: engines-order
key.description: Saved engines order in input method list

key.name: switcher-delay-time
key.summary: Popup delay milliseconds for IME switcher window
key.description: Set popup delay milliseconds to show IME switcher window. The default is 400. 0 = Show the window immediately. 0 < Delay milliseconds. 0 > Do not show the window and switch prev/next engines.

key.name: version
key.description: The saved version number will be used to check the difference between the version of the previous installed ibus and one of the current ibus.

key.name: use-xmodmap
key.description: Run xmodmap if .xmodmap/.Xmodmap exists.

key.name: xkb-latin-layouts
key.summary: Latin layout which have no ASCII
key.description: us layout is appended to the latin layouts. variant is not needed.

key.name: load-xkb-layouts
key.summary: XKB layout list which is shown on ibus-setup
key.description: XKB layout list which is shown on ibus-setup. The format is "layout" or "layout(variant)".

key.name: use-system-keyboard-layout
key.description: Use system keyboard (XKB) layout

key.name: embed-preedit-text
key.description: Embed Preedit Text in Application Window

key.name: use-global-engine
key.description: Share the same input method among all applications

key.name: enable-by-default
key.description: Enable input method by default when the application gets input focus

key.name: dconf-preserve-name-prefixes
key.description: Prefixes of DConf keys to stop name conversion

key.name: trigger
key.description: The shortcut keys for turning input method on or off

key.name: triggers
key.description: The shortcut keys for turning input method on or off

key.name: triggers-no-modifiers
key.summary: Trigger shortcut keys without modifier keys
key.description: Trigger shortcut keys without modifier keys. The list is used by ibus-gjs.

key.name: enable-unconditional
key.description: The shortcut keys for turning input method on

key.name: disable-unconditional
key.description: The shortcut keys for turning input method off

key.name: next-engine
key.description: The shortcut keys for switching to the next input method in the list

key.name: next-engine-in-menu
key.description: The shortcut keys for switching to the next input method in the list

key.name: prev-engine
key.description: The shortcut keys for switching to the previous input method

key.name: previous-engine
key.description: The shortcut keys for switching to the previous input method

key.name: group-list
key.summary: List of system keyboard layout groups on ibus-setup
key.description: The group list is used not to show all the system keyboard layouts by default. The list item will be appended at the end of gconf key. e.g. .../xkblayoutconfig/item1

key.name: west-europe
key.summary: List of European languages on ibus-setup
key.description: ibus-setup shows the languages only in input method list when you run ibus-setup on one of the languages. Other languages are hidden under an extended button.

key.name: south-europe
key.summary: List of European languages on ibus-setup
key.description: ibus-setup shows the languages only in input method list when you run ibus-setup on one of the languages. Other languages are hidden under an extended button.

key.name: east-europe
key.summary: List of European languages on ibus-setup
key.description: ibus-setup shows the languages only in input method list when you run ibus-setup on one of the languages. Other languages are hidden under an extended button.

key.name: north-europe
key.summary: List of European languages on ibus-setup
key.description: ibus-setup shows the languages only in input method list when you run ibus-setup on one of the languages. Other languages are hidden under an extended button.

key.name: west-asia
key.summary: List of Asian languages on ibus-setup
key.description: ibus-setup shows the languages only in input method list when you run ibus-setup on one of the languages. Other languages are hidden under an extended button.

key.name: center-asia
key.summary: List of Asian languages on ibus-setup
key.description: ibus-setup shows the languages only in input method list when you run ibus-setup on one of the languages. Other languages are hidden under an extended button.

key.name: east-asia
key.summary: List of Asian languages on ibus-setup
key.description: ibus-setup shows the languages only in input method list when you run ibus-setup on one of the languages. Other languages are hidden under an extended button.

key.name: india
key.summary: List of Asian languages on ibus-setup
key.description: ibus-setup shows the languages only in input method list when you run ibus-setup on one of the languages. Other languages are hidden under an extended button.

key.name: australia
key.summary: List of Asian languages on ibus-setup
key.description: ibus-setup shows the languages only in input method list when you run ibus-setup on one of the languages. Other languages are hidden under an extended button.

key.name: show
key.description: The behavior of property panel. 0 = Do not show, 1 = Auto hide, 2 = Always show

key.name: auto-hide-timeout
key.summary: The milliseconds to show property panel
key.description: The milliseconds to show property panel after focus-in or properties are changed.

key.name: lookup-table-orientation
key.description: Orientation of lookup table. 0 = Horizontal, 1 = Vertical

key.name: show-icon-on-systray
key.description: Show icon on system tray

key.name: show-im-name
key.description: Show input method name on language bar

key.name: use-custom-font
key.description: Use custom font name for language panel

key.name: custom-font
key.description: Custom font name for language panel
